ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 52
ygData.msgSnippet: I m simply stating the facts of the real business world.  If a worker at GM screws up and breaks a windshield, does the customer pay for that broken windshield
ygData.messageBody:
I'm simply stating the facts of the real business world. If a worker at GM
screws up and breaks a windshield, does the customer pay for that broken
windshield and the cost that it takes to fix it? no. When they buy the car,
they are paying for what it takes to make that car.

You think banded is low on some of your servers, you should see Cazic Thule.
There is a guy in Freeport (obviously made and twinkled by a high level char
just to be a smith) who sells banded dirt cheap. I"m talking from 2pp for a
gorget to 9pp for a tunic or cloak. Today at the Bazaar he had someone
standing in teh area of the bazzar announceing banded for sell then refering
them to the guy making it in freeport. I went to the forge and watched for a
bit, there was never less then 8-10 people lined up waiting on costum made
banded. He was there for hours makeing banded after banded item for dirt
cheap. He's making a killing on banded armor because he's found a way to
sell a ton of it at dirt cheap prices. and no, he's not taking a loss. He
has a VERY high smithing skill and only charges for what it costs to make the
banded plus a little for the work.


Talthoron

Personaly, my prices are more in your guys's range Gorget 4pp clear to a
tunic for 20pp. yes, I can sell it for these prices but I don't make nearly
the sales nor the money that the guy in freeport does.
